Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for us at $1500000. Considering its exceptional quality and unique features, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or business. I am offering this extraordinary opportunity to you at a special price of $1200000. This is an exclusive offer tailored to recognize your discerning taste and understanding of high-quality products. Please let me know if you wish to discuss further details or proceed with the purchase. I look forward to the possibility of sharing this remarkable item with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,200,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,200,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,500,000
